tool.name: Save as RO Crate
tool.description: Saves the output of a digitisation to disk as an RO Crate
tool.command: mkdir rocrate #if $singles_or_list.type == "list": #if $singles_or_list.input: #for $f in $singles_or_list.input.keys && ln -s "$singles_or_list.input[$f]" rocrate/"$f" #end for #end if #elif $singles_or_list.type == "singles": #for $dataset in $singles_or_list.single_files #if $dataset.single_file: && ln -s "$dataset.single_file" rocrate/"$dataset.single_file.name" #end if #end for #end if && rocrate init -c rocrate --gen-preview && zip -r sdr-output.zip rocrate
tool.help: Saves the output of a digitisation to disk as an RO Crate
